rooms.name: Garage
rooms.purpose: Two-car garage with ample space for storage
rooms.vastu_note: Avoid heavy traffic noise near living areas by situating on the side of the plot

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.purpose: Main living area with seating arrangements
rooms.vastu_note: Should face east or north for maximum light and positive energy flow

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.purpose: Area designated for dining, positioned adjacent to the kitchen
rooms.vastu_note: Keep the seating arrangement in a circular layout to promote family unity

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.purpose: Functional cooking area with sufficient counter space and storage
rooms.vastu_note: Place kitchen in the southeast quadrant for balance and prosperity

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.purpose: Private room for guests, ensuring comfort and privacy
rooms.vastu_note: Should be located away from noisy areas; ideally in the northeast quadrant

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.vastu_note: Positioned in the northwest area for stability and calmness, with a view of open space

rooms.name: En-suite Bathroom (Master)
rooms.vastu_note: Ensure adequate ventilation; avoid placing it directly above the kitchen if possible

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.purpose: Storage of household items and cleaning supplies
rooms.vastu_note: Place in a less prominent location to maintain the aesthetic flow

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.vastu_note: Main entrance should face north for positive energy flow

openings.name: Garage Door
openings.vastu_note: Should be in line with the main entrance for easy access but separated from living areas to reduce noise

openings.name: Window
openings.location: Multiple locations including living room, bedrooms and kitchen
openings.vastu_note: Windows should allow natural light and ventilation while ensuring privacy; ideally placed in east or south walls

openings.name: Balcony Access
openings.location: Adjacent to living room and master bedroom
openings.vastu_note: Provides outdoor space for relaxation and air circulation, aligning with Vastu by connecting indoors with nature

additional_info.vastu_summary: Key Vastu considerations include: main entrance facing north, kitchen in southeast quadrant, master bedroom in northwest, and guest bedroom positioned away from noise. The design ensures a balance between industrial aesthetics and traditional comfort with adequate open spaces for social interaction.
